Room.Name: Brick Cistern
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a ledge which spirals around the circular walls of the cistern.
Room.LongDescription: The cistern is lined with a ceramic brick, making a smooth surface for the circular well. The ledge you are on spirals around the wall, but provides very little in the way of hand holds. From here, its still a long way in either direction, up or down. Although there is a bright sky up above, there is very little light here, and even less below you.
